title: Beachfront Land in Ussangoda Tourism Area
details:
Valuable 116 perches land in Ussangoda. It face to famous beautifull Ussangoda beach in sri lanka, Other side we can see beautifull paddy field and ussangoda mountain, close to the ussangoda national park and Kochchama. This land suitable for eco tourism hotel project, holiday bungalow, villas or cabanas, 2km to colombo-hambantota main road, very well road access. water/electricity available.
* very clear deeds.

Contact us for more details.
